name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-accordion-with-richtext
title: Tab Accordion
shortDescription: This Web Part allows users to create content as Tabbed content using Property Field Collection Data and tinyMCE for Rich Text Editing targeted for SharePoint Online
longDescription: This Web Part allows users to create content as Tabbed content using Property Field Collection Data and tinyMCE for Rich Text Editing targeted for SharePoint Online

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
